subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=61|rad=心|as=05|sn=9|four=|canj=IDP|ids=⿱术心}}

# (archaic variant of [[悉]]) [[know]], [[learn]] about, [[comprehend]]
# [[completely]]
# to [[do]] one's [[utmost]] to
# a type of [[herb]] used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]], specifically the [[root]] of the [[w:Achyranthes|Achyranthes]]
# [[fine]] (texture)
# [[meticulous]], [[close]] (analysis)
# [[detailed]]

subSections.title: References
subSections.text: * [http://www.iso10646hk.net/jp/document/download.jsp Jyutping Database (iso10646hk.net) - Cantonese Pronunciation List (Part 2), p. 107]

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: The "know, learn about, comprehend", "completely", "to do one's utmost to" and "a type of medicinal herb" definitions are only used with the [[xī]] reading. The "fine", "meticulous", "close" and "detailed" definitions are only used with the [[shù]] reading.
